segment.source: Review the file types that are created and used by tools in the Internet Explorer Administration Kit 11 (IEAK 11).
segment.target: Review the file types that are created and used by tools in the Internet Explorer Administration Kit 11 (IEAK 11).

segment.source: File types used or created by IEAK 11 (Internet Explorer Administration Kit 11 for IT Pros)
segment.target: File types used or created by IEAK 11 (Internet Explorer Administration Kit 11 for IT Pros)

segment.source: File types used or created by IEAK 11
segment.target: File types used or created by IEAK 11

segment.source: A list of the file types used or created by tools in IEAK 11:
segment.target: A list of the file types used or created by tools in IEAK 11:

segment.source: File type
segment.target: File type

segment.source: Description
segment.target: Description

segment.source: .adm
segment.target: .adm

segment.source: An admin file (located at ), used by Group Policy to define the system policies and restrictions for Windows.
segment.target: An admin file (located at ), used by Group Policy to define the system policies and restrictions for Windows.

segment.source: You can use the IEAK 11 to change these settings.
segment.target: You can use the IEAK 11 to change these settings.

segment.source: .bat
segment.target: .bat

segment.source: An ASCII text file that contains a sequence of operating system commands, including the parameters and operators supported by the batch command language.
segment.target: An ASCII text file that contains a sequence of operating system commands, including the parameters and operators supported by the batch command language.

segment.source: When you run the batch file from a command prompt, the computer processes each command sequentially.
segment.target: When you run the batch file from a command prompt, the computer processes each command sequentially.

segment.source: .bmp, .gif, .jpeg, and .jpg
segment.target: .bmp, .gif, .jpeg, and .jpg

segment.source: Image files you can use to customize your toolbar button and favorites list icons.
segment.target: Image files you can use to customize your toolbar button and favorites list icons.

segment.source: For info, see the Customize the Toolbar button and Favorites List icons using IEAK 11 page.
segment.target: For info, see the Customize the Toolbar button and Favorites List icons using IEAK 11 page.

segment.source: .cab
segment.target: .cab

segment.source: A compressed cabinet (.cab) file, created by the Internet Explorer Customization Wizard 11 to store your custom compenent files.
segment.target: A compressed cabinet (.cab) file, created by the Internet Explorer Customization Wizard 11 to store your custom compenent files.

segment.source: We highly recommend that your .cab files be signed for security purposes.
segment.target: We highly recommend that your .cab files be signed for security purposes.

segment.source: For more info, see the Security features and IEAK 11 page.
segment.target: For more info, see the Security features and IEAK 11 page.

segment.source: .cif
segment.target: .cif

segment.source: A component info file (IESetup.cif), identifying the new or updated components you're going to install with Internet Explorer.
segment.target: A component info file (IESetup.cif), identifying the new or updated components you're going to install with Internet Explorer.

segment.source: Each component file has an associated ComponentID that's used by Windows Update Setup to determine whether a new component or an update exists.
segment.target: Each component file has an associated ComponentID that's used by Windows Update Setup to determine whether a new component or an update exists.

segment.source: .cmp
segment.target: .cmp

segment.source: Connection profile files that are created by the Connection Manager Administration Kit (CMAK).
segment.target: Connection profile files that are created by the Connection Manager Administration Kit (CMAK).

segment.source: .cms
segment.target: .cms

segment.source: Service provider files, created by the CMAK tool to specify the configuration of the phone book and many of the other functions of your service profiles.
segment.target: Service provider files, created by the CMAK tool to specify the configuration of the phone book and many of the other functions of your service profiles.

segment.source: .exe
segment.target: .exe

segment.source: Executable files that control the setup process, by installing the .cab files that install the custom browser package on your employee's devices.
segment.target: Executable files that control the setup process, by installing the .cab files that install the custom browser package on your employee's devices.

segment.source: .inf
segment.target: .inf

segment.source: Setup information files that provide installation instructions for your custom browser packages.
segment.target: Setup information files that provide installation instructions for your custom browser packages.

segment.source: For more info, see the Use the uninstallation .INF files to uninstall custom components page.
segment.target: For more info, see the Use the uninstallation .INF files to uninstall custom components page.

segment.source: .ins
segment.target: .ins

segment.source: Internet Settings files that specify how to configure your custom browser and its components.
segment.target: Internet Settings files that specify how to configure your custom browser and its components.

segment.source: You can create multiple versions of your custom package by customizing copies of this file.
segment.target: You can create multiple versions of your custom package by customizing copies of this file.

segment.source: For more info, see the Using Internet Settings (.INS) files with IEAK 11 page.
segment.target: For more info, see the Using Internet Settings (.INS) files with IEAK 11 page.

segment.source: .pac
segment.target: .pac

segment.source: Proxy auto-configuration script files that determine whether to connect directly to a host or to use a proxy server.
segment.target: Proxy auto-configuration script files that determine whether to connect directly to a host or to use a proxy server.

segment.source: For more info, see the Use the Automatic Configuration page in the IEAK 11 Wizard page.
segment.target: For more info, see the Use the Automatic Configuration page in the IEAK 11 Wizard page.

segment.source: .js and .jvs
segment.target: .js and .jvs

segment.source: JScript and JavaScript files that let you configure and maintain your advanced proxy settings.
segment.target: JScript and JavaScript files that let you configure and maintain your advanced proxy settings.

segment.source: For more info, see the Use the Automatic Configuration page in the IEAK 11 Wizard page.
segment.target: For more info, see the Use the Automatic Configuration page in the IEAK 11 Wizard page.

segment.source: .pvk
segment.target: .pvk

segment.source: A file format used by some certification authorities to store the private key of the digital certificate.
segment.target: A file format used by some certification authorities to store the private key of the digital certificate.

segment.source: The public part of the digital certificate is stored in an SPC file, while the private part is stored in the PVK file.
segment.target: The public part of the digital certificate is stored in an SPC file, while the private part is stored in the PVK file.

segment.source: For more info, see the Understanding certificates section of the Security features and IEAK 11 page.
segment.target: For more info, see the Understanding certificates section of the Security features and IEAK 11 page.

segment.source: .sed
segment.target: .sed

segment.source: Connection profile files, created by the CMAK tool, including the instructions for building the self-extracting executable (.exe) file for your service profiles.
segment.target: Connection profile files, created by the CMAK tool, including the instructions for building the self-extracting executable (.exe) file for your service profiles.

segment.source: Important
segment.target: Important

segment.source: You must never edit a .sed file.
segment.target: You must never edit a .sed file.

segment.source: .spc
segment.target: .spc

segment.source: The software publishing certificate file, which includes:
segment.target: The software publishing certificate file, which includes:

segment.source: The name and other identifying information of the owner of the certificate.
segment.target: The name and other identifying information of the owner of the certificate.

segment.source: The public key associated with the certificate.
segment.target: The public key associated with the certificate.

segment.source: The serial number.
segment.target: The serial number.

segment.source: The length of time the certificate is valid.
segment.target: The length of time the certificate is valid.

segment.source: The digital signature of the certification authority that issued the certificate.
segment.target: The digital signature of the certification authority that issued the certificate.
